Reviews.Title: “Quiet setting in business park”
Reviews.Author: Butzee
Reviews.Content: Stayed at this hotel for three nights and loved everything about it. Located in a business park, our room was on the back side and we couldn't believe how quiet it was. It featured everything we needed: a kitchen, plenty of closet space, spacious bathroom, a comfortable bed and more. Room comes with a DVD player and we took advantage of this perk by renting two movies for free from their library. The place was very clean and the staff friendly. Two computers available near the main lobby for Internet use. Easy to get to Indianapolis and back. Many restaurants within 5 to 10 minutes. I would recommend this hotel whether you are a business traveler, couple or a family.

Reviews.Title: “A pleasure to stay there!”
Reviews.Author: TravelingCass
Reviews.Content: What a wonderful hotel this is. The one bedroom suite was perfect with a comfortable king size bed and lots of closet space to allow you to settle in during your stay. The full size refridgerator was a bonus and having a the kitchen area was very convenient. I loved the recliner in the living room and the two areas to be able to spread out and work when I was in the room. The staff was very friendly and everything was handled very well. It was a pleasure to stay there and I can't wait to go back!

Reviews.Title: “newer property in very good shape 2011”
Reviews.Author: trav3908
Reviews.Content: this one sits off exit 21 north on I 465 and north of the busy cross street. Industrial/office area but neat and tasteful, mostly white collar area. This Candlewood is very new and shows it. Good parking .....will be worn out in a couple years but is good now. Remember that to use the cook tops you have to turn the timer on behind the stove. This way the stove doesnt start fires when people leave and forget to turn it off.This one is good....some others are trash.

Reviews.Title: “lots of free amenities, in business park”
Reviews.Author: traveladdict4ever
Reviews.Content: The room was very clean. It came with a kitchen. There were so many free amenities, from the free internet access, to the free parking, free movie rentals, and free printing in the business center. It was a great one day stop on my roadtrip, and I wish the other hotels on my roadtrip could have been as nice. My only complaint was that it was kind of in the middle of nowhere in a business park. There wasnt a whole lot around, so you had to drive for food, activities, etc.

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous value - just what we wanted”
Reviews.Author: LakeONsailor
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for three nights during the Brickyard 400 weekend (Fri-Sun). Fabulous value! We booked through Expedia and paid less than $75 per night (before taxes). New hotel. Very comfy bed and room is nicely appointed with reclining lounger and flat screen with satellite and DVD player (especially for the price….did I mention the price?) We wanted somewhere with a kitchen(ette) for breakfast and afternoon snacks and this suited our requirements perfectly – full size fridge, microwave, two burner stove, coffee maker, toaster. Close to the highway, and near to restaurants/fast food outlets, gas stations and a supermarket for provisions. We used the pool, the business center and the well-stocked "honour system" pantry shop for late night snacks. There is also a fitness centre and outdoor BBQ. Didn't have maid service, but who needs it for three nights? They provide if you stay one week but offered to exchange towels if we had needed to. A/C, temperature control in room so-so but it could have been more a function of trying to manage in 90+ temps outside? The free in-room wifi was slow, but there's the business centre with hardwire access and a printer. Great desk service. We had to move on the last night due a “funny noise” in our room – appears there was a water leak in the room above and they were drying out with high power fans which we could hear below. No problem – they moved us to another room and offered a discount which we could not take advantage of because we had pre-paid. Don’t think we will be back in Indianapolis anytime soon ourselves, but I would not hesitate to recommend if this is the type of accommodation you are looking for.

Reviews.Title: “best ever.we ll def be back”
Reviews.Author: DOCTORNOMAD
Reviews.Content: This was my first experience in an extededed stay hotel, It was perfect. we stayed here for 5 months 20days, and loved every minute of it. 1. clean rooms, relatively new hotel. 2. best reception staff, very attentive, helpful, Tony, erica, jennifer, and the manager Ken all of them , very helpful. 3. Lovely pool and gym. 4.slightly slow internet, 512kbps, but i dont care as long as the staff is so good. 5. very quiet, in 5 months , only night we had loud neighbors.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Stay”
Reviews.Author: CriderFam
Reviews.Content: We only stayed one night but I would have loved to stay longer. We didn't get the chance to enjoy the pool but I did walk around and check it out. Looked great. :) Our room was clean and tidy, Tony at the font desk was awesome, very friendly and helpful. This is our 2nd or 3rd stay at a Candlewood Suites (not all at this location) and my wife and I will lean towards staying at Candlewood whenever we travel. The price was extremely affordable especially compared to nearby hotels. Would highly recommend and we would certainly stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Value and Extremely Clean!”
Reviews.Author: StormGryphon
Reviews.Content: First off, for $70 dollars including taxes, this place is outstanding. The suite we had was beautiful, everything was spotless! The staff were very friendly and the onsite grocery store was fully stocked. Big comfy beds, nice pool, and hot tub! The only thing I saw wrong with the entire building was in the poolhouse, one of the light bulbs had caught fire a few weeks earlier so you could tell they were making repairs in that area. Also, the bathtubs seem to be a bit narrow, but I have a big tub at home so this could just be a matter of prefrence. Besides that, the rest of the building was in mint condition! It's right off the expressway and there are resturants literally 1 minute away from the parking lot! It's located in a very quite and seemingly safe industrial park area with lots of businesses and other hotels around it. I have absolutly no complaints becuase it was one of the best hotel experiences I've had to date!

HotelInfo.Name: Candlewood Suites Indianapolis Northwest
HotelInfo.Address: 7455 Woodland Drive, Indianapolis, IN 46278
